text: varito anu: "Varentakalam (guhalo) unnaro allah ku matrame telusu. Akasalalonu mariyu bhumilonu unna samasta agocara visayalu kevalam ayanake telusu. Ayana anta cudagaladu mariyu vinagaladu. Variki ayana tappa maroka sanraksakudu ledu mariyu ayana tana adhipatyanlo evvadini bhagasvamiga cercukodu
